name: HolidayKindness
0:
”Alexa, open holiday kindness”
”Alexa, launch holiday kindness”
”Alexa, start holiday kindness”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday kindness
des:
*Oct 2019: New suggestions for practicing random acts of kindness added for the holiday season. 
Please leave a review to encourage the developers if you love this skill. And share with your friends and family to spread kindness. The more you share, the happier you are.*
Kindness is contagious. By practicing kindness, we make the world a better place. Use this Holiday Kindness skill to get daily ideas on how to practice random acts of kindness and bring happiness into the world!
